00012 Rebel::Rebel(Round prop, int x, int y) {
00013         this->posX = x;
00014         this->posY = y;
00015 
00016         this->nextDirection = 0;
00017         this->direction = 1;
00018         this->poison = 0;
00019         this->type = prop.type;

00030 void Rebel::draw(SDL_Surface* surface, SDL_Surface* imageRebel) {
00031         SDL_Rect rect;
00032         rect.x = this->posX;
00033         rect.y = this->posY;
00034         SDL_BlitSurface(imageRebel, NULL, surface, &rect);
00035 
00036         // Healthbar
00037         if (this->poison > 0) {
00038                 // green color
00039                 boxRGBA(surface, this->posX, this->posY, this->posX + (20
00040                                 / this->maxHealth * this->health), this->posY + 2, 100, 255,
00041                                 50, (rand() % 200 + 50));
00042         } else {
00043                 // red color
00044                 boxRGBA(surface, this->posX, this->posY, this->posX + (20
00045                                 / this->maxHealth * this->health), this->posY + 2, 255, 50, 50,
00046                                 255);
00047         }
00048 }

00050 void Rebel::move(vector<int> environment) {
00051         // minimum speed
00052         if (this->speed < 1) {
00053                 this->speed = 1;
00054         }
00055 
00056         if (this->direction == 1) {
00057                 environment[2] = 0;
00058         } else if (this->direction == 2) {
00059                 environment[3] = 0;
00060         } else if (this->direction == 3) {
00061                 environment[0] = 0;
00062         } else if (this->direction == 4) {
00063                 environment[1] = 0;
00064         }
00065 
00066         if (environment[0] != 1 && environment[1] != 1 && environment[2] != 1
00067                         && environment[3] != 1) {
00068                 if (this->direction == 1) {
00069                         this->direction = 3;
00070                 } else if (this->direction == 2) {
00071                         this->direction = 4;
00072                 } else if (this->direction == 3) {
00073                         this->direction = 1;
00074                 } else if (this->direction == 4) {
00075                         this->direction = 2;
00076                 }
00077 
00078         }
00079 
00080         if (floor(static_cast<double> (this->posX % 30)) == 0 && floor(
00081                         static_cast<double> (this->posY % 30)) == 0) {
00082                 vector<int> availableDirection;
00083                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00084                         if (environment[i] == 1) {
00085                                 availableDirection.push_back(i + 1);
00086                         }
00087                 }
00088                 if (availableDirection.size() > 1) {
00089                         int randomDirection = rand() % availableDirection.size();
00090                         this->direction = availableDirection[randomDirection];
00091                 } else {
00092                         // up
00093                         if (environment[0] == 1) {
00094                                 this->direction = 1;
00095                                 // right
00096                         } else if (environment[1] == 1) {
00097                                 this->direction = 2;
00098                                 // down
00099                         } else if (environment[2] == 1) {
00100                                 this->direction = 3;
00101                                 // left
00102                         } else if (environment[3] == 1) {
00103                                 this->direction = 4;
00104                         }
00105                 }
00106         }
00107 
00108         if (this->direction == 2) {
00109                 this->posX += this->speed;
00110         } else if (this->direction == 4) {
00111                 this->posX -= this->speed;
00112         } else if (this->direction == 3) {
00113                 this->posY += this->speed;
00114         } else if (this->direction == 1) {
00115                 this->posY -= this->speed;
00116         }
00117 
00118         // poison
00119         if (this->poison > 0) {
00120                 this->health -= 0.20;
00121                 this->poison -= 0.20;
00122         }
00123 
00124 }
